:warning: *MasonryBoardComponent*
Score: 68% | Issues: 8
  - `matChipListLabel`: mat-chip-listbox missing accessible label. Screen readers cannot identify the ch
  - `colorContrast`: Low contrast 2.17:1 (needs 4.5:1). Low contrast text is difficult to read for us
  - `colorContrast`: Low contrast 1.91:1 (needs 4.5:1). Low contrast text is difficult to read for us

:warning: *AddSimpleItemDialog*
Score: 69% | Issues: 2
  - `matDialogFocus`: mat-dialog should manage focus. Focus should move to dialog and return on close

  - `prefersReducedMotion`: Animation without prefers-reduced-motion support. Animations can cause vestibula

:warning: *AddCategorizedItemDialog*
Score: 69% | Issues: 4
  - `matDialogFocus`: mat-dialog should manage focus. Focus should move to dialog and return on close

  - `contentOverflow`: Potential content overflow detected in ".category-progress-bar". This may hide t
  - `prefersReducedMotion`: Animation without prefers-reduced-motion support. Animations can cause vestibula

:warning: *ScenarioQuiz*
Score: 70% | Issues: 4
  - `contentOverflow`: Content may be hidden without visual indication in ".scenario-quiz". Text conten
  - `lineHeightTight`: Line height too tight for readability. Tight line spacing is difficult for users
  - `pointerEventsNone`: pointer-events: none may hide interactive element. Users cannot interact with el

:warning: *GuideIndexComponent*
